timeline.bodyText: As stated before on Discord, the condition and void method should not be on the same line.
timeline.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.message: Put the conditions and methods on separate lines

timeline.bodyText: the IF statement should be on it's own line
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.bodyText: Can you put this statement into a switch?
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.bodyText: Oh, also, can you switch these to for loops (based on other PRs / feedback to stay consistent)?
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.bodyText: The switch statement should have a default case that asserts false
timeline.author: APickledWalrus
